data: AMB Phlebotomy q6month for 1 year (Day of Treatment)
Reminder: Medical or Surgical Consent form required
once, pre phlebotomy, and as clinically indicated
once, post phlebotomy, and as clinically indicated
If/when Ferritin level is LESS than 50 ug/L and/or Hgb is LESS than 100 g/L (if labs available), then DO NOT perform phlebotomy
If/when Ferritin level is LESS than 50 ug/L and/or Hgb is LESS than 115 g/L (if labs available), then DO NOT perform phlebotomy
If/when Hematocrit is LESS than 0.42 (if labs available), then DO NOT perform phlebotomy
If/when Hematocrit is LESS than 0.45 (if labs available), then DO NOT perform phlebotomy
500 mL, IV, once, PRN: hypotension, drug form: bag
250 mL, IV, once, PRN, hypotension, drug form: bag
Pre Phlebotomy Lab testing to be collected by the nurse in clinic
Blood, Routine, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Routine, Unit Collect, Collection: T;N, once
Use this phase for laboratory testing that will be performed at an outpatient laboratory
Blood, Routine, Unit Collect: No,Collection: T;N, once, order for future visit, Every 6 month for 12 month, Grace Period (+/-) 3 day
Blood, Routine, Unit Collect: No,Collection: T;N, once, order for future visit, Every 6 month for 12 month, Grace Period (+/-) 3 day
